\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 74777}

\subsection*{Valerian Use}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Anonymous777}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 5  & oral & Valerian & capsule\\
\hline
 T+ 0:15 & 3  & oral & Valerian & capsule\\
\hline
 T+ 0:35 & 4  & oral & Valerian & capsule\\
\hline
 T+ 0:40 & 6  & oral & Valerian & capsule\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 135.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
500 Mg Equiv. 0.8\% Valerian Extract (Taken orally)



Took 5 capsules, waited 15 minutes, then (feeling nothing) took 3 more.



Felt a little comfortable, and my memory seemed to be a little effected. (Still is)



Waited 10-20 minutes, took 4 more capsules. Then about 5 minutes after, took 6 more.



On them right now, I feel very comfortable. Thats about it. My mind also seems a little fuzzy, and my perpective seems a little messed up - edges not lining up rarely.



Overall, I can see the legitiment uses of this drug but it's recreational use isn't very strong.

\end{document}
